alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Duval, east central Webb, northwestern Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Benavides to 7 miles southeast of Rosita to Ben Bolt. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alice, San Diego, Freer, Ben Bolt, Tecalote, Alice Acres, Rosita and Lake Alice. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 664 and 684. US Highway 59 between mile markers 762 and 780. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells; Webb
